title: Michael Munger on Profits, Entrepreneurship, and Storytelling
description: Mike Munger of Duke University talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about profit. What is profit's role in allocating resources? How should we feel about the people who earn profits or who take them in ways that may not be earned? How easy is it to discover profitable opportunities? Munger examines these questions through a series of stories, real and fictional, to illuminate the sometimes puzzling nature of profit.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
